UK to hit someone with your fist (= closed hand): He thumped him in the face.

to hit someone or somethinghitShe was expelled for hitting another pupil.whackShe whacked the water with her paddle.bashThe swinging door bashed him in the face.strikeShe had been struck on the head with a golf ball.beatHe was cruel to his dog and beat it with a stick.punchHe punched me in the stomach.

someone's head thumps
UK If your head thumps, you can feel pain in strong beats in your head: When I woke up my mouth was dry and my head was thumping.
See more someone's heart thumps
If your heart thumps, it beats more strongly and quickly than usual, because of exercise, fear, or excitement: She stood outside his room, her heart thumping.
